name: TAKE A LOOK
description:
"Get rid of the butlers to complete the task!"

is a puzzle adventure game that solves various puzzles and fulfills all tasks.
You go on a journey where you have to be a cat, a powder agent, and remove all the butlers from the map.

Living in a neat cafe, 'Powder' is a playful cute cat.
Inside the dark store after everyone gets off work.
Curious of the twinkling light from the bookshelf, the powder approached close,
I look at the shiny miniature assemblies, and the space starts to become distorted and I start to lose consciousness.
When I came to my senses, I suddenly became the main character of the miniature world.
Now, Garu, who is an agent in another world, tries to escape from this world by solving the mission one by one.
What's important is the unbroken heart... Will they be able to escape?
